articles.title: Afghanistan earthquake kills at least 1,000, toll expected to rise
articles.description: The death toll from an earthquake in Afghanistan on Wednesday hit 1,000, disaster management officials said, with more than 600 injured and the toll expected to grow as information trickles in from remote mountain villages.

articles.title: Baltimore Ravens LB Jaylon Ferguson dies at age 26
articles.description: Ravens outside linebacker Jaylon Ferguson has died at the age of 26, the team announced. The 2019 third-round pick had played three seasons in Baltimore.
articles.content:
OWINGS MILLS, Md. -- Baltimore Ravens outside linebacker Jaylon Ferguson has died at the age of 26, the team announced Wednesday.
